attributes.action: Make it illegal for companies to charge people more during school holidays
attributes.additional_details: I belive this to be wholly discriminatory against working class adults who have children. I belive that passing this legislation will make it easier and more affordable for working class families to access holidays without a detrimental effect on their child's education
attributes.background: Pass legislation prohibiting companies (mostly in the tourism industry) charging more for accomodation and services during the school holidays

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about prices for goods and services during school holidays are a matter for individual businesses, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Introduce school zones with requirements to stagger school holidays: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648454
